expo.name: weather-snap
expo.description: A sleek, contemporary weather app crafted with React Native Expo CLI. Users can retrieve weather details based on their current location or by inputting a city name. The app facilitates the addition and removal of multiple cities and offers both hourly and 3-day forecast insights. Weather Snap's intuitive interface, coupled with a slide-out menu for effortless city navigation, ensures a seamless weather-checking experience.
